Name: TRYON
About the game: A mixture of a minesweepe r and 'remember the pictures' . Remember as much information as possible, or act at random. Reach the finish line as quickly as possible in a variety of puzzles. And you can also make your own levels in the editor. What is in the game: 40 lvls with gradually rising difficulty Level editor Perfectly trains visual memory Ability to die near the finish and get on start again :)
